version_description: We bring updates to the App Store regularly so we can make WeatherBug even better for you! These updates include the latest bug fixes and improvements to speed and reliability. We'll make sure you know when new features become available.

We bring updates to the App Store regularly so we can make WeatherBug even better for you! These updates include the latest bug fixes and improvements to speed and reliability. We'll make sure you know when new features become available.

We bring updates to the App Store regularly so we can make WeatherBug even better for you! These updates include the latest bug fixes and improvements to speed and reliability. We'll make sure you know when new features become available.

We've updated the WeatherBug icon to look brighter and friendlier! We also made our app much easier to navigate so you can access all our great weather data and content with ease.

Check out our new features:
• Easy access to over a dozen of our weather maps with a simple tap of the new "Maps" tab
• Check all your important weather conditions with a quick scroll of the refreshed "Now" tab

Thank you for using WeatherBug!
We regularly update our app to include the latest bug fixes and improve speed and reliability.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We’ve added AI-powered Air Quality data in our app. Scroll down the Now tab to discover this new feature.

Our key Air Quality features are:
- Hyperlocal street-level Air Quality index
- Global Air Quality heat maps
- Activity recommendations
- Up to 16 hours hourly forecast
- Pollutants details

Check out our new Future Radar layer in our Maps. You can play this new map layer to visually see what the weather will look like for the next 60 minutes.

We’ve added AI-powered Air Quality data in our app. Scroll down the Now tab to discover this new feature.

Our key Air Quality features are:
- Hyperlocal street-level Air Quality index
- Global Air Quality heat maps
- Activity recommendations
- Up to 16 hours hourly forecast
- Pollutants details
Bug fixes and performance improvements

We launched our new Video Section featuring trending weather clips, fun facts, health and safety tips.

We also regularly update our app to include the latest bug fixes and improve speed and reliability.

We enhanced our Hurricane Center to keep you informed with more precise real-time data.

We also regularly update our app to include the latest bug fixes and improve speed and reliability.
We regularly update our app to include the latest bug fixes and improve speed and reliability.

You can now receive alerts for your current location and all US saved locations by selecting those cities in notification settings.

We also regularly update our app to include the latest bug fixes and improve speed and reliability.

We have now released our new fire section to help you stay informed on the active wildfires around you. We have also released a new Augmented Reality feature in the Air Quality section where you can experience air particles floating around.
